name: Fable Of Heroes II: The Dark Ritual
name_original: Fable Of Heroes II: The Dark Ritual
description:
Basic Info:
The sequel to Fable Of Heroes. This is a very basic RPG with not many fancy systems, just solid balance and gameplay. If you like oldskool rpgs and are looking for a solid play through, this is that game. I am just one man, doing what I can on my free time to make the best product I can.

One of the biggest feedbacks from the last game I produced was the walkspeed was too slow. That issue has been taken care of. You'll find an item that increases your walk speed very early in the game.

Story:
It's been 20 years since the fall of the Demon King, and peace has returned to the land. All signs of malevolent beings seems to have faded. However, it seems evil lurks even in humans, there are beasts living in all men. A group of humans that worship demons are hell bent on using that power that granted Descia her strength. If such power could turn a small princess into a lord of death and suffering, then one can only imagine what would happen if such a thing was used on a powerful wizard.

Katalina lives with her father in the town of Mazar, and it's common for her to go on quests with her dad, but this time things are different as he quickly rushes out to head for a far away kingdom, leaving Katalina to face her first quest by herself. Her curiosity to follow her father leads her to an adventure she never expected.

Features:

- Zelda-esque tools, explore new areas with new tools.

- Classic NES-era and SNES-era RPG gameplay.

- 10+ hours of gameplay.

- Optional bosses.

- Optional dungeons.

- More than 150 different monsters.

- Numerous secrets and side quests to discover.

- Highly Polished.

- Challenging game balance.

- Easier than Fable of Heroes I.
